sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, Form, Button, Table, Badge, Tab, Tabs, Alert } from 'react-bootstrap'; function UserVault() { const [assets, setAssets] = useState([]); const [trustedContacts, setTrustedContacts] = useState([]); const [newAsset, setNewAsset] = useState({ assetType: 'email', platformName: '', accountIdentifier: '', credentials: '', actionType: 'delete' }); const [newContact, setNewContact] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', relationship: '' }); const handleAssetSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const asset = { ...newAsset, id: Date.now(), status: 'active', createdAt: new Date().toISOString() }; setAssets([...assets, asset]); setNewAsset({ assetType: 'email', platformName: '', accountIdentifier: '', credentials: '', actionType: 'delete' }); }; const handleContactSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const contact = { ...newContact, id: Date.now(), status: 'pending', createdAt: new Date().toISOString() }; setTrustedContacts([...trustedContacts, contact]); setNewContact({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', relationship: '' }); }; const removeAsset = (id) => { setAssets(assets.filter(asset => asset.id !== id)); }; const removeContact = (id) => { setTrustedContacts(trustedContacts.filter(contact => contact.id !== id)); }; return (

Digital Asset Vault

Securely register your digital assets and manage trusted contacts for your digital legacy.

Add New Digital Asset
Asset Type * setNewAsset({...newAsset, assetType: e.target.value})} required > Platform Name * setNewAsset({...newAsset, platformName: e.target.value})} required /> Account Identifier * setNewAsset({...newAsset, accountIdentifier: e.target.value})} required /> This information will be encrypted and stored securely. Credentials/Notes setNewAsset({...newAsset, credentials: e.target.value})} /> Optional. All sensitive data is encrypted using industry-standard encryption. Default Action Policy * setNewAsset({...newAsset, actionType: e.target.value})} required > You can create detailed policies in the Action Policies tab.
Registered Assets ({assets.length})
 {assets.length === 0 ? ( No assets registered yet.
Start by adding your email accounts, bank accounts, and social media profiles. ) : ( {assets.map((asset) => ( ))}
Platform Type Action Status
{asset.platformName}
{asset.accountIdentifier} 		{asset.assetType.replace('_', ' ')} {asset.actionType} {asset.status}
)}
Add Trusted Contact
 Important: Trusted contacts can verify death events and execute your digital legacy policies. Choose people you trust completely.
Full Name * setNewContact({...newContact, name: e.target.value})} required /> Email Address * setNewContact({...newContact, email: e.target.value})} required /> Phone Number setNewContact({...newContact, phone: e.target.value})} /> Relationship * setNewContact({...newContact, relationship: e.target.value})} required >
Trusted Contacts ({trustedContacts.length})
 {trustedContacts.length === 0 ? ( No trusted contacts added yet.
Add at least one trusted contact who can verify death events and execute your policies. ) : ( {trustedContacts.map((contact) => ( ))}
Name Contact Info Relationship Status
{contact.name} {contact.email}
{contact.phone && contact.phone} 		{contact.relationship} {contact.status}
)}
); } export default UserVault;
